ABOUT

Coding has fascinated me since 2006 when I started university. However, given the perception at time that computer science is a very difficult option, I was very terrified to pursue it and studied civil enginering instead. It wasnâ€™t upon completion of my master studies, 7 years later, that I decided to shift career and become a full web developer in spite of failing to secure a good job in my planning field. In order to achieve this, I took online programming courses on https://openclassrooms.com/en/dashboard thanks to https://andela.com/alc/in Rwanda which offered me a generous scholarship.

Having gained the skills I was longing for, I hope to immerse myself into coding and become an expert in the field. This way, I will make significant contribution to achieving the sustainable development goals (SDGs) by using the power of technology to create innovative solutions to pressing challenges in Africa.

Here are some skills I've learnt with so far:

SKILLS:
Front-end:
  • JavaScript
  • React
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
Back-end:
  • Node.js
  • Express
Other:
  • Git
  • Mocha/Chai
  • Agile development

); } } export default Stuff;
